00015 # ifndef BOOST_PREPROCESSOR_REPETITION_ENUM_PARAMS_HPP
00016 # define BOOST_PREPROCESSOR_REPETITION_ENUM_PARAMS_HPP
00017 #
00018 # include <boost/preprocessor/config/config.hpp>
00019 # include <boost/preprocessor/punctuation/comma_if.hpp>
00020 # include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/repeat.hpp>
00021 #
00022 # /* BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS */
00023 #
00024 # if ~BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EDG()
00025 #    define BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(count, param) BOOST_PP_REPEAT(count, BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_M, param)
00026 # else
00027 #    define BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(count, param) BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_I(count, param)
00028 #    define BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_I(count, param) BOOST_PP_REPEAT(count, BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_M, param)
00029 # endif
00030 #
00031 # define BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_M(z, n, param) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) param ## n
00032 #
00033 # /* BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_Z */
00034 #
00035 # if ~BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EDG()
00036 #    define BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_Z(z, count, param) BOOST_PP_REPEAT_ ## z(count, BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_M, param)
00037 # else
00038 #    define BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_Z(z, count, param) BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_Z_I(z, count, param)
00039 #    define BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_Z_I(z, count, param) BOOST_PP_REPEAT_ ## z(count, BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_M, param)
00040 # endif
00041 #
00042 # endif
